title: New: Father Sculptor Release Teaser Trailer
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/Father-Sculptor1.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/19659-new-father-sculptor-release-teaser-trailer/attachment/father-sculptor1/)

An intriguing teaser trailer to kick start your week, with Crack in the Road favourites [**Father Sculptor**](http://www.fathersculptor.com/) returning to the furor in mysterious fashion. Featuring a soundtrack which stands as the band’s newest material since their well received collection of summer demos, the trailer employs a great level of visual ambiguity and a development upon what was already a very strong aesthetic presence. Concluding with the flashing statement, ‘Faith & Violence’, one can only guess as to what else is set to be released from Father Sculptor in the coming weeks, however they have recently confirmed support dates with **Wolf Alice **& **Swim Deep**.
